title: Struggled With How To Word That
description:
An emotional day leads to quite the awkward text exchange (00:01:00). Asshole former fans of this podcast dupe a dangerous human into making extreme threats against Kirk & his family (00:02:44). Team Minihane is back this week on The Dozen (00:19:45). Michelle Tafoya is taken off the Sunday Night Football sidelines and some are speculating it was because of her appearance on 'The View' (00:24:00). Kirk made it clear he will not be promoting a podcast that he used to promote and a name change by our Friday guest... Introducing Chris Klemmer (00:31:10) & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
